description: Numbers n such that 80*R_n + 7 is prime, where R_n = 11...1 is the repunit (A002275) of length n.
comments: Also numbers n such that (8*10^(n+1)-17)/9 is prime.a(21) > 10^5. - _Robert Price_, May 20 2014
links: Makoto Kamada, Prime numbers of the form 88...887.
